texts.name: Toole Sadul
texts.biography: Toole Sadul is a brilliant magician and alchemist, but sometimes his creations are strange, but that doesn't make them any less effective in battle.

specialty.description: Increases the speed of Walkers or Bronze Walkers by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 7 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Walkers
